 +4% Critical Damage

transcend.6:

 +4% Critical Damage

SKT_FIRST.name: Lunge
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000006_1_1]</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Quick Assault
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000006_2_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Noble Strike
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nIf this attack kills an enemy, increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>3 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy.\nIf this attack kills an enemy, increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000006_3_2]</color> and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000006_3_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase Speed for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000006_chain_1_1]</color> chance to increase Speed for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000006_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000006_backup_1_1]</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
